website_summaries.verdict: The Logitech PlayGear Pocket Lite is a perfectly good case for the DS Lite, but many will find it to be unnecessary overkill for the already durable Nintendo handheld.
pros: Durable, solid plastic case for Nintendo DS Lite
includes space for storing four DS games
provides access to all ports and controls
improves DS ergonomics for those with larger hands
cons: DS Lite clamshell design precludes the need for a case

customer_reviews.title: Good On-The-Go Case
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent case to use if you're taking a trip and want to take a couple of games with you. It gives the DS good protection and you could play it while inside the case. The only thing I didn't like was that it doesn't have a handle or shoulder strap. Also, there is only space for 4 games while many other cases have room for at least 6+. However, I still recommend it. I will use this case for taking the DS out of the house and the G-Pack organizer for home use.
customer_reviews.author: M. Guerra

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate console protection
customer_reviews.text: Bullet proof protection for your system. Can play with case installed.
customer_reviews.author: Algeman

customer_reviews.title: I loved it, but my son didn't seem to impressed with it.
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was a great case, but whenever he played it he always took it out of the case, and for me the whole point was for him to keep it in there. I am not even sure if he knows where it is anymore. I liked that you could design it yourself. I printed off some sonic and mario stuff and they have templates so that you can decorate it to your liking. wish my son liked it as much as I did.
customer_reviews.author: AngieP-rez

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe the Description about a Warranty! Seller did NOT honor it, less than 60 days and it's broken/defective
customer_reviews.text: I thought it WAS a Fantastic hard storage case! I used this for our 8 yr olds ds lite. The fact that they we can print out pics or draw their own is just a bonus 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom of 5

customer_reviews.title: Great Item For A Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This item is a great case for a DS Lite. It has four slots in the lid for games and I love the ability to customize with an image or photo! My little guy has his own picture on his case and it looks adorable. The one drawback is the fact that the lid does not sit snugly against the top of the DS when it is open. That could be improved to add more protection. If the item is dropped while open, it can bounce out of the case.
customer_reviews.author: candicherry1987

customer_reviews.title: Durable and heavy duty but a little hard to open
customer_reviews.text: This item does a great job at protecting the Nintendo DS Lite game but it does add some weight to it. Haven't dropped it yet to see if it really holds up but so far so good in terms of protection. It is a bit hard to open for my 4 1/2 year old but my 7 1/2 year old has no issues. I like the look and the storage is great! I would definitely recommend this product and don't regret buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina A. Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Great Case
customer_reviews.text: My kids were dropping their DSs and a few had broken hinges. Since the top would break off soon after I bought two of these cases to protect them. Works like a charm. After the first day I had it one dropped off the counter and the case busted open at the hinge. DS intact, score. Put the case back together and still using it. I have had this for 3 months now.
customer_reviews.author: MyName

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for your DS
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved being able to create unique covers for their DS. The game storage in the lid is awesome. My brother saw it and is now planning to order one for his son. He has the nerf cover, but loved the ability to make it unique and store games.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Handy(Handle-less) Case
customer_reviews.text: So far this case is pretty great. Holds my NDS Lite very firmly, and can hold 4 DS Games. The only problem I have is charging the NDS while playing, the cases' lid seems to almost bend the charger port when it's opened. Also removing the GBA/Slot 2 cover is kind of hard to do while in the case, but once it's removed the GBA games fit just fine through the port. Other than those to teeny problems this case is really neat, I like the customization options. Although I would have liked a .PDF of the template, the plastic templates work but are not the easiest things to work with. Overall I really like this case.
customer_reviews.author: Byron Mendelson

customer_reviews.title: Better protection than we thought it would be AND it has storage!
customer_reviews.text: We were so happy to find a sturdy case for my 8 year old son's DS Lite with space for a few games. It came with templates so he can change the look of it anytime he wants. I was surprised at how sturdy it was given how little we paid for it and we were really happy with how fast it got to us.
customer_reviews.author: mom of c and c

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our younger son's Nintendo DS. It was key to have protection against damaging the DS with accidental drops and manhandling. The cover is very basic but the slight padding along the inside edges is good. The cover is a very plain white and most kids would prefer a trademark character protection cover which can be costly. We solved this issue by letting our son have at it with permanent markers to make his own design case. Problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: Curious One

customer_reviews.title: Nintendo Cover
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this PlayGear cover for my daughter because I couldn't find NerfArmor in a color that she liked. I am so happy with my choice! She can print any picture she wants from the computer, or make her own drawings, and use the template to design her own covers. She loves being able to change it as often as she chooses. The rubber lining protects her Nintendo and makes it very easy to change out her pictures. There is even storage inside for extra games - which the product details fails to let you know.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Pinsky

customer_reviews.title: ALMOST great...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for Christmas - good solid case - like that it can be left in the case while playing and/or charging. Comes with a stencil to be able to cut out pics/designs to fit right inside the top and bottom, basically allowing you to 'design' your own case. The only drawback was that the clasp is a bit difficult to open. For the first month, I had to open it for my 6 year old. She eventually got the hang of it, but be aware if you are purchasing it for a younger child.
customer_reviews.author: M L S

customer_reviews.title: Great DS Lite case!
customer_reviews.text: This case met our needs perfectly - needed something that would protect the DS lite while it was being played, and loved that this case also had game storage. My kids haven't customized the cover yet, but that is a neat feature also!
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Only slightly less bulky than my other case.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good, hard case to carry my DS in my back pocket. I have a neoprene case that works but it's padding makes it too bulky and stresses my pants. This Logitech case is slimmer and strong, but it's still too thick and is also uncomfortable back there. It would be thinner if it didn't hold additional games. If you carry a purse or other bag, it's fine. My DS is back in my messenger bag/man purse.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sims

customer_reviews.title: GIFT..

customer_reviews.text: We bought this case for my 7 year old so that he could bring the DS in his backpack to play with at the sitter's house after school. It's very strong and was well worth the money.

My 4 year old son is very happy with it, he especially likes that you can store 4 game cartridges in the case. I would definitely recommend, especially when it's for a younger DS-player.

product_meta.title: Logitech Nintendo DS Lite PlayGear Pocket
product_meta.description:
Your Nintendo DS Lite keeps you happy and entertained. So be sure to keep it safe and protected. The Logitech PlayGear Pocket Lite is a durable hard case that provides unlimited personalization options, allows you to play your favorite games without removing your DS Lite from the case, and even has room to store up to four extra game cartridges. So protect it. Customize it. Play it. With the Logitech PlayGear Pocket Lite.

AMAZON.COM


The Logitech® PlayGear Pocket LiteTM offers customizable protection for the DSTM Lite while in transit and during play

The Logitech® PlayGear Pocket LiteTM protects your DSTM Lite while in transit and during play. Templates for creating custom skins let you personalize your DS Lite with your own images or artwork; durable polycarbonate construction, play-in-case design provides access to all controls and connections; a protected storage compartment holds up to four DS Lite games; and a secure snap closure keeps your DSTM Lite safe and in place while on the go.

Features



Template included for creating custom skins



Durable polycarbonate construction



Play in-case design for access to all controls and connections



Storage for up to four Nintendo DSTM Lite game cartridges


What's in the Box

 * Logitech® PlayGear Pocket LiteTM case
 * NPS insert
 * Skin template
 * Warranty and safety information card/document

System Requirements: Nintendo DSTM Lite
feature_bullets: Keeps your DS Lite safe and in place while on the go
Polycarbonate construction puts a shell of armor around your DS Lite.
Play-in-case design provides access to all controls and connections.
DS Lite game storage carries and protects up to four DS Lite games.
Secure snap closure keeps your DS Lite safe and in place while on the go.
